Technical Expert / Technial Lead - Production Control Unix

Apply dynamic leadership talents over geographically dispersed associates in the United States and abroad. Meticulously analyze business requirement specifications with IT functional business sponsor and internal or external delivery teams to ensure solutions meet the overall quality, standards, and business goals. Guarantee strict compliance with standards and business requirements by guiding the application of sound systems engineering and deployment best practices. Work collaboratively with the sponsor to align technology priorities mainly in break/fix, project efforts, performance improvements, and enhancements.
Team Lead - Production Control Wintel / Unix

Displayed unsurpassed management expertise to 9 direct reports in 3 states and 18 additional team members in India on 2 different teams. Maintained frequent interaction with other information technology teams to ensure sufficient requirements for the production control teams and to successfully complete quality work in a timely manner. Planned and coordinated bi-weekly individual and team meetings to address issues. Built and cultivated long-term quality relationships with customers by resolving their technical issues under time constraints while ensuring their utmost satisfaction. Fostered a positive working environment and team unity among staff to enhance overall efficiency.
Systems Engineer - Operations / Production Control Mainframe/Unix/Windows

Demonstrated proficiency to multitask in corporate and retail environments on the production control teams. Executed application optimization between business and vendors by consistently providing consistent, stable, and repeatable processes.	Seamlessly fulfilled engineering, deployment, and analytical work on the Mainframe, UNIX, Windows, and PeopleSoft platforms 	Modernized the retail business core functions through innovation of Oracle Retail Merchandising system 	Earned distinction as a technical lead for multiple scheduling systems encompassing up to 200,000 scheduled processes 	Streamlined the development and deployment processes which resulted to successful risk mitigation	Developed functional documentation for submission to level one help desk, in conjunction with operations process leads 	Set strategic direction to the documentation process, facilitating growth within the unique organizational units	Exhibited superior talents in assisting more than 50,000 mainframe jobs related to all business aspects to minimize business downtime

Bachelors of Science in Computer Engineering Technology
Computer programming, networking, and administration. Electronics engineering, DC and AC analysis.
Side activities included coaching bowling to a wide caliber of bowlers, from beginner to advanced. Also coached handicap children and adults.

Graduated with Magna Cume Luade honors with a 3.63 graduating GPA. Received honorable mentions during with our Senior Project. The project was called V.I.E.W. (Vehicle Icident and Event Witness). Entailed four cameras monitoring various views around a vehicle while recording data in 30 second increments. If an accident occurred, an additional 30 seconds would be added to the current file being written to for proof of what occurred during the accident. GPS tracking was also involved so as soon as an accident occurred, a simulation with the exact coordinate of the accident was relayed to police authorities. The simulation was sent to a nearby computer.

recommendations: January 2, 2013, Jeremy was senior to Amit but didn’t manage directly

During Amit's tenure with SuperValu Inc., I worked very closely with him to help seamlessly manage production deployments in our UNIX environments. Amit was very easy to work with and successfully learned the tools we use very quickly, and he efficiently managed his workload to enable quick turnarounds for our customers, both internally and externally, so our SLAs would be met. I would recommend Amit Kumar to take on any new challenges he may come across and to become a solid leader for any team in the future. Amit has the ability to overcome obstacles and with an out-of-the-box mentality to help drive results.~Jeremy McElliott

summary: Technically sophisticated, analytical, and talented IT executive powered with broad-based experience in production control and project management; complemented with strong educational foundation. Well-rounded skill set in directing successful IT departments by implementing effective strategies to optimize business processes, elevate efficiency, and improve quality while significantly streamlining operations. Equipped with high-caliber qualifications in delivering simultaneous, large-scale, and mission-critical projects within the constraints of scope, quality, time, and cost. Out-of-the box thinker and hands-on manager with keen expertise in leading, motivating, and coordinating technical teams to provide innovative technical solutions and ensure total customer satisfaction. Extremely capable of multitasking in a globally competitive, multiplatform, and fast-paced environment with dedication to superior service.
